mapper.select: select *, (SELECT p.`PATH` FROM T_PHOTO p WHERE p.`id` = a.cover) COVER , (select p.THUMB from T_PHOTO p where p.id=a.COVER) THUMB, (select count(*) from T_PHOTO p where p.`ALBUMID`=a.`id` )count from T_ALBUM a where a.GROUP = #{id} AND a.IS_VALID="Y" order by a.id desc;
select LINK, (select p.PATH from T_PHOTO p where p.id=c.cover) PATH from T_COVER c order by `ORDER`;

select id, (select p.PATH from T_PHOTO p where p.id=a.COVER) COVER, (select p.THUMB from T_PHOTO p where p.id=a.COVER) THUMB, a.NAME, a.DESC, a.ORDER from T_ALBUM a where a.group=#{groupId} AND a.IS_VALID="Y" order by a.id desc;
select id,`NAME`,`DESC`,`PATH`,`THUMB` from T_PHOTO where albumid = #{albumId} order by id desc
select * from T_ALBUM a where a.id = #{id};
select *, (select count(*) from T_PHOTO a where a.`ALBUMID`=b.`id` )count from T_ALBUM b order by b.id desc limit #{count} ;
select * from T_PHOTO a where a.`ALBUMID`= #{id} order by a.id desc
mapper.update: update T_ALBUM a SET a.cover = #{photoId} where a.id = (select p.ALBUMID from T_PHOTO p where p.id=#{photoId})
